headline: Attract the world’s boldest, most transformative grant proposals
campaignDescription: MacArthur Foundation’s 100&Change initiative seeks to address the biggest challenges of our time through a single, $100 million grant, inviting qualified organizations to compete for the prize by surfacing bold solutions that will make measurable progress toward solving a critical global issue. C&C partnered with MacArthur to spread the news of 100&Change among those working on frontlines of our biggest challenges globally, and, moreover, to deploy focused outreach to the underrepresented innovators of Latin America, Africa, and Southeast Asia—far exceeding period-over-period benchmarks for proposal volume, quality, and diversity.

carousel.body: Our messenger chatbot was a popular tool that also helped verify that citizens were getting the info relevant to them, and that they had intentions to begin or get better about their recycling habits.
